message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $7000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8200. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $8200. Would you be willing to meet me at $7500?

I understand you're still looking for a bit more wiggle room, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to go all the way to $7500. I'll meet you at $8100. It's the best I can do, and I think you'll still get a great deal.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $8100. Would you be willing to meet me at $7800?

I understand you're still looking for a bit more flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to go all the way to $7800. I'll meet you at $8050. It's the best I can do, and I think you'll still get a great deal.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above $8050. Would you be willing to meet me at $7900?
